rukus.text: Soni chisimu chene mundu twan’gumbile ni lilongo lyejumu lyakulilaga (nkuligombamo) lyakuumila m’matope gakupiililila geunde
Sano lijini twaligumbile kala kuumila ku malamba ga moto gangali lyosi
Soni (kumbuchilani) katema kawawechete Ambuje wenu kwa Achimalaika kuti: “Chisimu Une tingumbe mundu ni lilongo lyejumu lyakulilaga (nkuligombamo) lyakuumila m’matope gakupiililila geunde.”
“Sano patimale kunkolosya ni kumpepelela nsimu wakuuma Kukwangu, basi munsenjelemukuchile pakunsujudila.”
Basi ni wasujudu Achimalaika wosope wene nakamo
Pangawaga Ibulisu; jwakanile kuti awe pamo ni akusujudu
(Allah) jwatite: “E mmwe Ibulisu! Chipali chichi kukwenu chintendekasisye kuti nkawa pamo ni akusujudu?”
Jwalakwe jwatite: “Une nganimba jwanti nikunsujudila mundu jwamun’gumbile ni lilongo lyejumu lyakulilaga (nkuligombamo) lyakuumila m’matope gakupiililila geunde.”
(Allah) jwatite: “Basi kopokani mwalakwemo, mwanti chisimu mmwe (sano) n’di wakuwinjidwa.”
“Soni chisimu pachanya penu pana malweso mpaka Lisiku Lyamalipilo.”
Jwalakwe jwatite: “Ambuje wangu! Mumbanitu lipesa (lyakuti ngawa) mpaka lisiku lyatachiukulidwa (m’malembe achiiumbe wosope).”
(Allah) jwatite: “Basi chisimu mmwe n’di mwa akupedwa lipesa.”
“Kwikanila lisiku lya ndema jakumanyika (jagombedwa lipenga lyandanda, pele ni patinchiwila).”
Jwalakwe jwatite: “Ambuje wangu! Ligongo lyanti munechelele kusokonechela, basi chinasalalichisye kwene wanganyao pa chilambo (litala lyesokonechele), ni chinasokonesye kwene wanaose.”
(Allah) jwatite: “Ali nilitala lya Kukwangu lyalili lyagoloka.”
“Chisimu achikapolo Wangu nganinkola mmwejo pa wanganyao machili, ikaweje awala watakankuyeje (mwakusaka kwao) mwa akusokonechela.”
Soni chisimu Jahannama ni malo gao gaakupedwa chilanga wanaose
Jikwete milango nsano najiwili, nnango uliose ukwete liunjili mwa wanganyao lyegawidwegawidwe
